com.prodp.apsim
Class APClientProcess

java.lang.Object
  com.prodp.apsim.APProcess
      com.prodp.apsim.APClientProcess

public class APClientProcess
extends APProcess

Identity class for telling APSim that the user is playing a multiplayer game.

Constructor Detail

APClientProcess

public APClientProcess(java.lang.String ip,
                       java.io.InputStream a,
                       java.io.OutputStream b,
                       java.lang.String name)
Constructor. Creates a new instance of this class. The IP address of the server, the input & output streams, and the name of the process are used.

Parameters:
ip - the IP address of the server
a - the stream to read input from
b - the stream to send output data
name - the name of the process
